metadata.title: CVE-2021-45762 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: GPAC v1.1.0 was discovered to contain an invalid memory address dereference via the function gf_sg_vrml_mf_reset(). This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
